lucky: You must not let any lack of candor stand between you and what you want today -- whether it is yours or someone else's. Tell the truth!
Things are not likely to be as certain as you had hoped today. You may have to travel a winding path to get to your destination.
Someone may ask you to predict the future in some way today -- but you're not willing to let the cat out of the bag just yet!
What you witness today may be far more serious than anyone directly involved is willing to admit -- and you may be asked to tell your story.
You can get back to the basics today. A friend sees things very much the way you do, which is likely to smooth the way for you just in time.
You're not likely to experience any kind of disloyalty or mutiny today, and your plans can progress according to schedule.
You may be deprived of something valuable by someone who has been working against you for some time. You can make things right by day's end.
You can certainly uncover some unusual bargains today but take care! You mustn't spend money on that which you don't really want!
Others may withhold their support for a while today until you have explained yourself fully. You have nothing to hide -- do you?
Serious charges may have been leveled against you, but if you are entirely truthful you can prevail -- no matter how tricky things get.
Someone may ask questions of you today that indicate he or she is getting closer to a hidden truth. You may be troubled by more than that!
You will require cooperation between your teammates and a third party today if you're going to turn fantasy into reality.
